english.segment1: Distance makes my heart to fester. in self-inflicted pain. If I can't face the consequences of my actions. I'll find somebody else to blame
english.segment2: I greet you with a brother's kiss. and crank the knife anothertwist
english.segment3: Twisting facts to fit the fabrications of my mind. I find I've crossed the line. No matter what the cost I must be right
english.segment4: I greet you with a brother's kiss. and crank the knife another twist. pointing to things that don't exist. I crank the knife another
english.segment5: Alone among the ashes of the things. which once defined my life. I hold the match that lit the fire. but you'll never see me take the blame.
